member.name: P:CinematicModel.FireBoltAction.MaxDurationAsText
member.summary: this property exists to make parsing the nullable int work. use MaxDuration when querying the FireBolt Action

member.name: P:CinematicModel.DomainActionParameter.Name
member.summary: correlates name of parameter with parameter in xImpulse domain model

member.name: T:CinematicModel.SmartModelSettings
member.summary: describes how the hierarchy ofthe xImpulse plan will be used to fill in missing information in the read model.

member.name: P:CinematicModel.SmartModelSettings.AnimationMaxSearchDepth
member.summary: how many steps the model will attempt to step up in the xImpulse object hierarchy when confronted with an action for which the executing actor has no animation mapping. Attempts to use animation mappings for parent objects. Set to 0 to prevent searching.

member.name: P:CinematicModel.SmartModelSettings.ActorMaxSearchDepth
member.summary: how many steps the model will attempt to step up in the xImpulse object hierarchy when confronted with an actor whose name is unknown. Will use a model defined for a parent object class provided it is within maxActorSearchDepth steps of the actor in the hierarchy Set to 0 to prevent searching.
